The Pet snakeling is a pet dropped by Zulrah. It resembles the appearance of the snakelings that Zulrah summons during the fight. Players can right click "Metamorphosis" to change it between its normal, magma, or tanzanite form.

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the chatbox will state You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a cat), it will be placed into their inventory. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack. If a player's inventory is full and they have a follower already, they will not receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory), it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 coins to Probita in East Ardougne to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 June 2016
(update)

The pet item could no longer be turned into a bank placeholder.

9 April 2015
(update)

"Talk-to" was made the left-click option instead of "Pick-up".

15 January 2015
(update)

Pet snakelings were given a graphical update to resemble Zulrah instead of a recoloured sea snake, and was given the ability to metamorphose between three forms.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When stored in a POH Menagerie, the snakeling will periodically change between its three forms when allowed to roam.

It resembles the appearance of the [[snakeling]]s that [[Zulrah]] summons during the fight. Players can right click "Metamorphosis" to change it between its normal, magma, or tanzanite form. When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the [[Chat Interface|chatbox]] will state {{Colour|#ef1020|You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.}} However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a [[cat]]), it will be placed into their [[inventory]]. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state {{Colour|#ef1020|You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack.}} If a player's inventory is full '''and''' they have a follower already, they '''will not''' receive the pet. On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory), it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely. Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 [[coins]] to [[Probita]] in [[East Ardougne]] to have this pet insured.
